mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.birth AS "birth", a.community AS "community", a.communityKey AS "communityKey", a.degreeOfEducation AS "degreeOfEducation", a.disability AS "disability", a.famliyAddress AS "famliyAddress", a.famliyNum AS "famliyNum", a.farmersAndHerdsmen AS "farmersAndHerdsmen", a.gender AS "gender", a.healthy AS "healthy", a.housingArea AS "housingArea", a.housingKind AS "housingKind", a.idCard AS "idCard", a.identity AS "identity", a.incomeSource AS "incomeSource", a.incomeSourceKey AS "incomeSourceKey", a.insurance AS "insurance", a.insuranceKey AS "insuranceKey", a.marriage AS "marriage", a.medicalInsurance AS "medicalInsurance", a.membershipTime AS "membershipTime", a.modelWorker AS "modelWorker", a.name AS "name", a.nation AS "nation", a.nationKey AS "nationKey", a.organization AS "organization", a.originalWorkAddress AS "originalWorkAddress", a.partInJobTime AS "partInJobTime", a.phoneNumber AS "phoneNumber", a.politicalLandscape AS "politicalLandscape", a.postCode AS "postCode", a.problemKind AS "problemKind", a.registerKind AS "registerKind", a.registerPlace AS "registerPlace", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.salaryFamliy AS "salaryFamliy", a.salaryPerson AS "salaryPerson", a.serialNumber AS "serialNumber", a.staticFlag AS "staticFlag", a.subsistenceAllowances AS "subsistenceAllowances", a.version AS "version", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.assist_id AS "assistId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo( id, birth, community, communityKey, degreeOfEducation, disability, famliyAddress, famliyNum, farmersAndHerdsmen, gender, healthy, housingArea, housingKind, idCard, identity, incomeSource, incomeSourceKey, insurance, insuranceKey, marriage, medicalinSurance, membershipTime, modelWorker, name, nation, nationKey, organization, originalWorkAddress, partInJobTime, phoneNumber, politicalLandscape, postCode, problemKind, registerKind, registerPlace, remarks, salaryFamliy, salaryPerson, serialNumber, staticFlag, subsistenceAllowances, version, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, assist_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{birth}, #{community}, #{communityKey}, #{degreeOfEducation}, #{disability}, #{famliyAddress}, #{famliyNum}, #{farmersAndHerdsmen}, #{gender}, #{healthy}, #{housingArea}, #{housingKind}, #{idCard}, #{identity}, #{incomeSource}, #{incomeSourceKey}, #{insurance}, #{insuranceKey}, #{marriage}, #{medicalInsurance}, #{membershipTime}, #{modelWorker}, #{name}, #{nation}, #{nationKey}, #{organization}, #{originalWorkAddress}, #{partInJobTime}, #{phoneNumber}, #{politicalLandscape}, #{postCode}, #{problemKind}, #{registerKind}, #{registerPlace}, #{remarks}, #{salaryFamliy}, #{salaryPerson}, #{serialNumber}, #{staticFlag}, #{subsistenceAllowances}, #{version}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{assistId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE userinfo SET birth = #{birth}, community = #{community}, communityKey = #{communityKey}, degreeOfEducation = #{degreeOfEducation}, disability = #{disability}, famliyAddress = #{famliyAddress}, famliyNum = #{famliyNum}, farmersAndHerdsmen = #{farmersAndHerdsmen}, gender = #{gender}, healthy = #{healthy}, housingArea = #{housingArea}, housingKind = #{housingKind}, idCard = #{idCard}, identity = #{identity}, incomeSource = #{incomeSource}, incomeSourceKey = #{incomeSourceKey}, insurance = #{insurance}, insuranceKey = #{insuranceKey}, marriage = #{marriage}, medicalInsurance = #{medicalInsurance}, membershipTime = #{membershipTime}, modelWorker = #{modelWorker}, name = #{name}, nation = #{nation}, nationKey = #{nationKey}, organization = #{organization}, originalWorkAddress = #{originalWorkAddress}, partInJobTime = #{partInJobTime}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, politicalLandscape = #{politicalLandscape}, postCode = #{postCode}, problemKind = #{problemKind}, registerKind = #{registerKind}, registerPlace = #{registerPlace}, remarks = #{remarks}, salaryFamliy = #{salaryFamliy}, salaryPerson = #{salaryPerson}, serialNumber = #{serialNumber}, staticFlag = #{staticFlag}, subsistenceAllowances = #{subsistenceAllowances}, version = #{version}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, assist_id = #{assistId} WHERE id = #{id}
